name: Byparr
description: Byparr is a FlareSolverr drop-in replacement with FastAPI and nodriver. It allows applications like Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr to access websites that are protected by Cloudflare and other anti-bot systems.

notes.text: Byparr can be updated via the update script or manually by pulling the latest code from GitHub.
